content: *APOLLOSSERVİCES*  Do you need some strong marketing? Look no further!   *What we offer:*  - CMC & CG listings - CMC/Dextools/Poocoin/Pinksale/Crypto.com trending - Trust Wallet updates - Lots on lots of exchanges (Binance, Kucoin, Gate.io, etc.)- Endorsements deals- Mass dms (Twitter, Discord, Instagram) - Programming Bots- CoinMarketCap Token Circulation Verification - CoinMarketCap TagsLimited Time: Top 1-3 Dextools trending $8,000 (Deal must consist of 100+ days.) %100 guarenteed CoinMarketCap/CoinGecko (listing/trending) services  to order pm @zapitrinantopik On telegram Check my channel and services https://t.me/apolloproof i accept escrow NO UPFRONT NECESSARY FOR SOME CLİENTS

comments.author: The Cryptovator
comments.body: I think you are overcharging. However, I am struggling to find Dextools trending for my clients. Most of the Telegram offer is scammers. Since you don't need upfront from a trusted person, we might work together. I will hold the funds and would pay even every few hours. But I am not ready to pay upfront anyway. If you agree to this condition then we may talk through Telegram. DM me from my profile, I won't DM you first at all. Be careful of scammers.
